author: buschmi
msg: LUCENE-584: Changed Filter API to return a DocIdSet instead of a java.util.BitSet. This allows using more efficient data structures for Filters and makes them more flexible.

author: cmchen
msg: slight elaboration of exif writing sample code.
also slightly refactored the unit tests to make quick tests more efficient.

author: kmenard
msg: Replaced StringBuffer with StringBuilder for a bit of a performance boost.
